title: Rune Enthusiast Ward Skin?
body:
If someone is available, how do you get this ward skin? 

I know it was on the PBE, and I saw someone use it in game. I was under the impression that it'd be given out to everyone who used wards in the past, but I could be mistaken. Is there some other way you're supposed to get it, or is it a "We're sending them out, it might take some time" sort of thing?

replies.body: That rune came from having owned one of the 'special' runes like the Razer Runes or Intel Runes. Basically any of the unusual ones.

I'm constantly getting the names of things mixed up, and why we get  them.
So, there's the 
- Rune Archivist Summoner icon for having spent RP on rune pages.
- Rune Enthusiast ward skin for having spent at least 125.000 IP on runes pre-2017 season.
- Rare Rune Owner Summoner Icon for owning one or more limited rune.

Correct?

Also, what's the official name for the icon used as reward for owning one or more of the old limited runes?
A friend of mine got that icon, but neither of us have any idea what it's called or even why he got it (he had some of the limited runes, so we think that's the reason).

-------------

Lastly, what we're only missing now is the **Reign of Order** Summoner icon made _legacy_ - SO WE CAN GET IT!!

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/8e/ProfileIcon1669.png/revision/latest?cb=20170601013408

Also, there was talk about wanting suggestions as to what could be sold in the Essence emporium:
- Hextech keys!
Ah, gotcha. Thanks for letting me know!
